channel.title: CVE Feed for TianoCore -- EDK II
channel.description: The latest CVEs for TianoCore -- EDK II

item.title: CVE-2021-28216|2024-08-03T21:40:13.115Z -- tianocore -- edk%20ii
item.description: BootPerformanceTable pointer is read from an NVRAM variable in PEI. Recommend setting PcdFirmwarePerformanceDataTableS3Support to FALSE.

item.title: CVE-2021-28213|2024-08-03T21:40:12.905Z -- tianocore -- edk%20ii
item.description: Example EDK2 encrypted private key in the IpSecDxe.efi present potential security risks.

item.title: CVE-2021-28210|2024-08-03T21:40:12.971Z -- tianocore -- edk%20ii
item.description: An unlimited recursion in DxeCore in EDK II.

item.title: CVE-2021-28211|2024-08-03T21:40:13.314Z -- tianocore -- edk%20ii
item.description: A heap overflow in LzmaUefiDecompressGetInfo function in EDK II.
